title: Static Analysis

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (cc.calliope.mini.ScannerActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

manifest_analysis.title:

manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.

metadata.cwe: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
metadata.description: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.

FCS_RBG_EXT.1.1.choice: The application use no DRBG functionality for its cryptographic operations.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['bluetooth', 'network connectivity', 'location'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does encrypt some transmitted data with HTTPS/TLS/SSH between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "text_select_editor" : "Wähle dein Lieblingswerkzeug aus und leg einfach los!"

"location_permission_info" : "Ab Android 6.0 Marshmallow benötigt die Anwendung eine Standortberechtigung, um nach Bluetooth-Geräten zu suchen. 

Dies liegt daran, dass Bluetoothn verwendet werden kannn, um den Standort des Telefons und des Benutzers zu bestimmen. mini wird diese Informationen in keiner Weise verwenden."
"dfu_status_aborted_msg" : "Application flashing has been aborted. Please reset micro:bit and try again."
"dfu_status_error_msg" : "Flashing unsuccessful. Please reset micro:bit and try again."
"info_text_pairing" : "Press and Hold A+B while pressing the Reset-Button once to get your mini into pairingmode."

"location_permission_info" : "From Android 6.0 Marshmallow onwards the application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth devices. 

This is because Bluetooth may be used to determine the phone's and user's location. mini will not use this information in any way."
"bluetooth_disabled_info" : "The Bluetooth adapter is turned off. Click the button below to enable it."

"info_text" : "Hallo und willkommen in der Calliope mini App!

Mit Hilfe dieser App kannst du dich mit deinem mini verbinden und mobil programmieren.

Unter „Mit mini verbinden“ kannst du deinen mini finden und eine Bluetooth Verbindung herstellen.
Das original Skript kannst du über den Punkt „Start-Program“ laden und auf den mini spielen.
Der Punkt „Code erstellen“ gibt dir die Möglichkeit unterschiedliche Programmieroberflächen zu testen und deinen mini zu steuern.
Bei „Deine Programme“ kannst du gespeicherte Programme auswählen und auf den mini spielen

Infos zu tollen Projekten oder weiteren Aktionen findest du auf der Calliope Webseite unter https://calliope.cc!

Um die App nutzen zu können, wird ein Calliope mini dringend empfohlen.

Falls du Fragen oder Anmerkungen hast, kannst du uns an die Emailadresse info@calliope.cc eine Nachricht schreiben.

Viel Spaß wünscht dir das Calliope Team!

Calliope gGmbH
Raumerstrasse 11
10437 Berlin




"
"dfu_validation_failed" : "Validation failed or Timeout. Please reset micro:bit and try again."

"mini_guide_info" : "1. Make sure the mini is turned on and is connected to a power source using a micro USB cable or a coin cell is plugged in. 

2. Make sure the mini firmware is flashed."
"text_welcome" : "Flash your own programs to your mini!"
"bluetooth_disabled_info" : "Bluetooth scheint deaktiviert zu sein. Drücke unten auf „Anschalten“, um Bluetooth zu aktivieren!"

"info_text" : "Hello and welcome to the Calliope mini app!
By using this app you can connect, code and flash programs to your Calliope mini via Bluetooth.

You can find inspiring and fun projects at the Calliope website at https://calliope.cc!

Have fun!

Calliope gGmbH
Raumerstrasse 11
10437 Berlin
Germany
Email info@calliope.cc




"
"text_select_editor" : "Choose your favourite tool and start coding!"
"info_text_pairing" : "A+B gedrückt halten, währenddessen Reset drücken und loslassen, um den mini in den Pairingmodus zu versetzen."

"mini_guide_location_info" : "3. Location is turned off. Some Android phones require it enabled in order to scan for Bluetooth devices. 

If you are sure your mini is advertising and it doesn't show up here, click the button below to enable Location."

"mini_guide_info" : "1. Ist dein mini angeschaltet? Überprüfe die Stromverbindung 

2. Ist Bluetooth auf dem mini aktiv? Installiere die mini Firmware, falls du nicht sicher bist."

"mini_guide_location_info" : "3. Der Standortservice ist deaktiviert. Einige Android-Handys erfordern die Aktivierung, um nach Bluetooth-Geräten zu suchen. 

Wenn du sicher bist, dass dein mini sichtbar ist und nicht hier angezeigt wird, klicke auf die Schaltfläche unten, um den Standortservice zu aktivieren."

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup=true]
This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: Activity (cc.calliope.mini.ScannerActivity) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.

warning.title: Activity (cc.calliope.mini.receiveFileIntentActivity) is not Protected.
warning.description:
An intent-filter exists.
An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.

warning.title: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
warning.description:
The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x04g-Testing-Cryptography.md#weak-random-number-generators

info.title: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
info.description:
The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x05d-Testing-Data-Storage.md#logs

secure.title: This application has no privacy trackers
secure.description: This application does not include any user or device trackers. Unable to find trackers during static analysis.

hotspot.title: Found 1 critical permission(s)
hotspot.description:
Ensure that these permissions are required by the application.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION (dangerous): coarse (network-based) location - Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.
